attributes.action: 'Source out' the evalution of MP's salaries to an independent arbitrator such as ACAS.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to: ''Source out' the evalution of MP's salaries to an independent arbitrator such as ACAS.'

The early Americans wanted“No taxation without representation”. I
contend that the present voting public feels similarly.

 I gather from the media that this parliament has gone to war, gone soft on criminals, soft on immigration, and yet seeks rises in MP’s salaries and allowances! Very few of which statements the general public would disagree with.

All of which annoys those of us who pay income tax, road tax, vehicle tax, council tax, fuel tax and VAT, but have not the wherewithal to pay more increases. 
The result being, the voter is ‘deluded’ into thinking he is getting a raw deal!

The sooner MP’s realise this, they may get back some of the respect we had for them many years ago.
Please, support this petition, thus helping to restore “Government by the people”
……etc.
